    • 方法详细资料

      • add

        public Note add(java.lang.String token,
       java.lang.String nodePath,
       java.lang.String text)
         throws LockException,
                PathNotFoundException,
                AccessDeniedException,
                RepositoryException,
                DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: NoteModule
        Add a note to a document
        指定者:
        add 在接口中 NoteModule
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        text - The message text
        返回:
        A note object with the new created note properties.
        抛出:
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in the repository with this path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.String token,
          java.lang.String notePath)
            throws LockException,
                   PathNotFoundException,
                   AccessDeniedException,
                   RepositoryException,
                   DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: NoteModule
        Remove a note from a document
        指定者:
        delete 在接口中 NoteModule
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        notePath - The path that identifies an unique document note.
        抛出:
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in the repository with this path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • get

        public Note get(java.lang.String token,
       java.lang.String notePath)
         throws LockException,
                PathNotFoundException,
                AccessDeniedException,
                RepositoryException,
                DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: NoteModule
        Get note from document
        指定者:
        get 在接口中 NoteModule
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        notePath - The path that identifies an unique document note.
        返回:
        The required note associated to the document.
        抛出:
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in the repository with this path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't access this document because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • list

        public java.util.List<Note> list(java.lang.String token,
                        java.lang.String nodePath)
                          throws PathNotFoundException,
                                 RepositoryException,
                                 DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: NoteModule
        Retrieve a list of notes from a document.
        指定者:
        list 在接口中 NoteModule
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The path that identifies an unique document.
        返回:
        A Collection with the document notes.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no document in this repository path.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException
